import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { map, Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { TreeModel } from './tree.model'; import { TreeService } from './tree.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tree', templateUrl: './tree.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tree.component.scss'], }) export class TreeComponent { @Input() tree: any = []; constructor(private treeService: TreeService) {} ngOnInit(): void { // this.treeReturn = this.treeService.getTree(); } addNode(tree: any, node: any) { return this.treeService.addNode(tree, node); } addChild(tree: any, node?: any) { return this.treeService.addChild(tree, node); } removeNode(tree: any, node: any) { return this.treeService.removeNode(tree, node); } }
